name: Chumlee's Adventure: The Quest for Pinky
overview:
The hustle and bustle at the World Famous Gold & Silver Pawn Shop has been part of the fabric of Las Vegas for the past thirty years. No one knows this better than Chumlee.

Chumlee has been an employee at the pawn shop for over 15 years and has seen it all, from priceless artifacts to worthless knock off items. He’s put in thousands of hours of hard work and now he’s finally ready for a break!

Join everyone’s favorite pawn broker Chumlee as he navigates his way through the ever busy pawn shop to enjoy a day in the sun with his pup Pinky! Make your way past the countless customers and their unique items. Battle it out with Antwaun, Corey & Rick before a final encounter that will blow your mind!

Are you ready for the challenge? Are you ready to “Be Awesome”? Get out there or get back to “Work”!
